description: The base class for all bpe tokenizers. It mainly provides common tokenizemethods for bpe type tokenizer.

params.name: encoder_json_path
params.description: file path of the id to vocab.

params.name: vocab_bpe_path
params.description: file path of word merge text.

params.name: unk_token
params.description: The special token for unknown words.Defaults to [UNK].

params.name: sep_token
params.description: The special token for separator token.Defaults to [SEP].

params.name: pad_token
params.description: The special token for padding.Defaults to [PAD].

params.name: cls_token
params.description: The special token for cls.Defaults to [CLS].

params.name: mask_token
params.description: The special token for mask.Defaults to [MASK].
